## PLAN ##

To find the remainder of two integers `a` and `b`, I will use the modulo operator `%`.
The modulo operator returns the remainder of integer division.

I will define a function named `remainder` that takes two integer arguments `a` and `b`.
Inside the function, I will use the modulo operator to find the remainder of `a` divided by `b`.
I will return this remainder as the output of the function.
